price: តែបើអ្នកណាបានបែរចេញ(ពីកិច្ចសន្យា)ក្រោយពីនោះ គឺពួកទាំងនោះហើយជាពួកដែលមិនគោរពតាមបទបញ្ជា។
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
